data.price: 1. Ixxic Nabiyow: maaca gine Rabbi maggansitaah kaa eleelita.
3. Kaadu gibdi dite leh yan barih umaanek kaa maggansita, usuk (bar kinnuk) culah yan waqdi.
4. Kaadu kuntuubaabil baabah tuf- tufó abtah tan sayyóh umaanek koo maggansita.
5. Kaadu kuuxe waynanli kuuxe waynan aba waqdih umaanek koo maggansita.

dua.name: Dua for Spiritual Protection
dua.significanceReason: Provides a powerful invocation for protection from negative influences, spiritual harm, and unseen challenges.
